name: Babies 4 Breakfast!
description:
You should get som breakfast before you starve. You can smell some delicious baby tears in the woods.

Hurry, before your breakfast is taken by somebody else!

Controls: Move with WASD or arrow keys. You control your flashlight with the mouse arrow.

My entry for https://itch.io/jam/heartjam - Theme was "Scarcity". This game has scarce light and time. Wish I had more time, as I did not use the whole weekend. But in the end, my goal was to submit something!

Source code: https://github.com/fossegutten/Babies4Breakfast-_HGJ2018

Tools: Aseprite and Affinity Designer for the assets. Godot engine 3.0.2 for the game.
